message.name: ERR_PHONENUMBER_FV_PHONENUMBER_EMPTY
message.locale: Phone Number must not be blank.

message.name: ERR_PHONENUMBER_FV_SHORT
message.locale: Phone number invalid. Phone Number entries must have at least 3 digits.

message.name: ERR_FAXNUMBER_FV_FAXNUMBER_EMPTY
message.locale: Fax Number must not be blank.

message.name: ERR_FAXNUMBER_FV_SHORT
message.locale: Fax number invalid. Fax Number entries must have at least 3 digits.
